div.p: Henry Barkly to the Duke of Newcastle
Film no. 833, CO 309, Mitchell Library, Sydney.

MS annotation by […]: 'Victoria No. 12', '3757 Victoria' and stamped 'RECEIVED 13 APR 1860'.
Having communicated to the Members of the Philosophical Instutute, your Grace's Despatch of 8th November N° 46, conveying Her Majesty's most gracious sanction for the assumption in future by that Body of the title of "the Royal Society of Victoria", — I have been requested by the President of the year, Dr Mueller, to express on their behalf, their grateful appreciation of the honor thus conferred, as well as their earnest hope that the confidence evinced towards the Society in so auspicious a manner will be justified by the high position it may be destined to attain.
